name: Dragon Cultist
description: The Dragon Cultist is a medium humanoid with a twisted devotion to dragon masters. They wield a dagger and are skilled in deception and persuasion.
memorable: Their ability to resist mental effects makes them a challenging opponent.
goals: To serve their dragon masters and spread their influence.
relations: Related to other dragon cultists and dragons.
environment: Can be found in places where dragon cults have taken root.
strengths: Good Dexterity, Wisdom, and spellcasting abilities enhance their agility and manipulation.
weaknesses: Average Strength and Intelligence limit their physical effectiveness in combat.
attacks: Utilizes a dagger for melee or ranged attacks and has powerful spells like Inflict Wounds and Hold Person.
most_powerful_ability: Hold Person can paralyze a foe, making them vulnerable to attack.
skills: Proficient in deception and persuasion, making them skilled social manipulators.
additional_information: Immune to one damage type from their dragon master's breath weapon
Advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened
4th level spellcaster with a spell save DC of 12
Prepared spells include damage and control options
Can cause substantial harm with necrotic damage attacks
spellcasting: 4th level spellcaster using Wisdom; prepares various spells including damage and control options.
